parties: Represents a long-term extension to the low end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.  An extension of the negative carbon emissions reached in 2100, leading to slowly declining forcing.

name: RCP26-extension Well Mixed GHG
rationale: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6 extension, future, scenario, SSP1, RCP2.6 extension,  Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6 Extension Well Mixed Greenhoue Gases
